title: Crochet Master!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Ayumu, look!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Wow! Itâ€™s a crochet rice ball! Hanayo, did you make it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yep! ğ…  I made it using the leftover yarn from when we made the crochet bunny together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thatâ€™s amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hehe, itâ€™s because you taught me and helped me get the hang of it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Even though it was just a kit, you made your own original crochet doll! Thatâ€™s really impressive!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hehe, thank you~! So, I was thinking... I want to give this to you, Ayumu...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Huh? Are you sure?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yep, as a thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Iâ€™m so happy! Thank you, Hanayo.
